rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
[i]Threshold[/i] – {1}{G}: Return Trapper’s Intuition and enchanted creature to their owners’ hands. Activate this ability only if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.
notes:
2k17
Regenerate enchanted creature > Return Trapper’s Intuition and enchanted creature to their owner’s hands

fluffy: owner’s —> owners’, use —> activate
